entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 11:30 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: W 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
